channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Author Marge Fenelon discusses the mother wound, a lasting affliction caused by a compromised mother-child bond. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 1 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: As she recalls the story of the Annunication from Luke 1, Mother Angelica prays that God will teach her something about his mother, and that viewers will learn something about Mary that will really make them love her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Church Universal
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph is joined by members of Kkottongnae, a South Korean group who create hope and new life, as they share their process for putting Love in Action. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Edith Stein: St. Teresa Benedicta Of The Cross
channel.desc: Father Charles Connor examines the life of St. Edith Stein: a philosopher, and convert from Judaism who died in a Nazi concentration camp, offering her life for the conversion of her people. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Apostoli: Mother Teresa, Servant Of The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Apostoli shares one of his favorite memories of Mother Teresa, while others recount stories of her humor, kindness, and attentiveness to the needs of others. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford explains how to face the world through the few words spoken by Jesus on the Sermon on the Mount. These reflections can literally change our lives and those we meet. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Hayden Augustine welcomes Fr. Eugene and pilgrims from the Diocese of Orange as they testify to this eye opening experience through the works and the life of the brothers of the Missionaries of the Poor. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sacred Stories: St. Maximilian Kolbe
channel.desc: The life of St. Maximillian Kolbe, a priest, missionary and martyr who, in an ultimate act of love, offered his life to save a fellow prisoner at Auschwitz, during World War II. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cat Chat
channel.desc: The Cat Chat family uses songs and humor to teach us all about our Amazing, Loving Father in Heaven. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: The Sorrowful mysteries of the Rosary present events from Jesus' passion in a way that children can understand and be inspired by. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Viewer questions are answered about why priests are called ?Father,? when people are not allowed to receive Holy Communion, who can bless a home, whether Mary was perfect, and why abortion is always wrong. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Destined for a political career, St. Ambrose of Milan instead made serving God his life?s mission. As one of our greatest bishops, he defended the authentic teachings of the Church and opened up Scripture to the masses. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Fr. Michael McGivney
channel.desc: Miracle Hunter, Michael O?Neill examines the canonization case of Fr. Michael McGivney. This founder of the Knights of Columbus was beatified in 2020 after the miraculous cure of a young boy was attributed to him. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: ?thiopie, Allez Et Faites Des Disciples
channel.desc: L??thiopie est un pays ? majorit? chr?tienne : deux tiers d?habitants professent le christianisme. Les musulmans repr?sentent environ un tiers. Les chr?tiens ?thiopiens appartiennent surtout ? l??glise orthodoxe ?thiopienne. Les catholiques ne repr?sentent qu?environ 1 % de la population. Bien qu?une petite minorit?, l??glise catholique g?re environ 90 % des programmes sociaux. La production raconte les exp?riences de trois pr?tres : le p?re Elvis du P?rou, le p?re John d?Italie et le p?re Isaiah du Kenya. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy looks at the profound holiness of Blessed Mother Teresa of Calcutta and what we can learn from it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cambodge Le Christ Mutile
channel.desc: Pendant le r?gime des Khmers rouges au Cambodge, le parti a tu? environ 1,7 million de personnes, dont pr?s de la moiti? ?taient catholiques. Il y a une trentaine d'ann?es, cependant, l'?glise d?vast?e a connu une renaissance dans un pays dont la majorit? de la population est de confession bouddhiste. Personne ne r?sume mieux cela que l'?v?que ? Kike ? (comme on l'appelle localement), le pr?fet apostolique de Battambang. Il a fond? le centre Arrupe dans le nord-ouest du Cambodge en 2001 avec l'intention de restaurer la dignit? et les droits des personnes victimes des mines terrestres gr?ce ? la possibilit? d'?tudier et de travailler. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Featuring Fr. Patrick Peyton, nephew of the Rosary Priest who preached that families who pray together stay together. He discusses his famous uncle and his current work at Collooney Parish in County Mayo, Ireland. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From Eve To Mary ? The True Dignity Of The Woman
channel.desc: A wide variety of testimonies are used to highlight certain destructive trends in the media and modern day society, such as feminism, that cause women to grow farther and farther away from their vocation to holiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: EWTN?s epic series continues with the rise of state churches in countries like Germany and Switzerland, where Magisterial Protestantism blurs the lines between secular and religious authority. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Explore one of the 20th century's most highly approved Marian apparition cases, as the Virgin with the Golden Heart appeared 33 times to five children at a convent school in Beauraing, Belgium. Michael O?Neill reports. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris Stefanick teams up with Catholic survivalist Will Hince to live off the land high in the American Rockies with minimal provisions while exploring God?s profound creations. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Mary Leone-Paradis and how she served the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica discusses silence of the heart and of the mind. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: Issues of superstition and idolatry are on the agenda today as our hosts tackle the burning question: Can religious practices be excessive? Learn how to prioritize quality over quantity in your life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Tom Nash and Fr. Wade explore how Abraham?s offering of his only son Isaac prefigures the Sacrifice of the Son of God, whom our heavenly Father sent to save the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch looks at Deutero-Isaiah, or ?second Isaiah,? which takes us back to Babylon of the late 540s BC, where the Lord summons Isaiah to be a prophet to the exiles. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Eucharist
channel.desc: Fr. Koch and the young adults look at how the Last Supper is related to the Passover. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn On Location
channel.desc: Msgr. Eugene Morris gives a homily on ?hope? in Christian life and Justin Fatica tells his story about finding purpose through faith by serving others over pursuing career success. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Marge Fenelon explains the signs of suffering from the mother wound and how Mary can be the key to healing it. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 2 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. examines what the Bible has to say in regard to how man achieves salvation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: As the confrontation between St. Joan of Arc and Robespierre reaches a climax, the true intentions behind their actions are revealed leaving no doubt who is saint and who is sinner. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Chesterton Station
channel.desc: When Dickens? character Buzfuz puts him on trial, Chesterton defends against the accusations. We meet other Dickens characters throughout while his role as a father is scrutinized. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: This episode is devoted to the historical and theological aspects of Baptism. As only Father can, he brings humor, theology, psychology and reason to explain why it is a Sacrament and how Baptism is performed. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on some of the writings of Fr. Frederick William Faber of England concerning the Blessed Sacrament and some of the devotions we have - 40 Hours, Perpetual Adoration, visits. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Discover the Papal Basilica of Saint Mary Major, a church that witnessed centuries of faith ? and now holds Pope Francis in eternal rest. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From Eve To Mary ? The True Dignity Of The Woman
channel.desc: A wide variety of testimonies are used to highlight certain destructive trends in the media and modern day society, such as feminism, that cause women to grow farther and farther away from their vocation to holiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin? Catholic
channel.desc: When Jacek gets frustrated with math homework, Pete and Rob come to the rescue and learn a bit about Holy numbers in Scripture along the way. (30 minutes).
